item.title: 📝 makalin/CornerFix (21 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: makalin

📝 Repository: makalin/CornerFix

📄 Descrizione: CornerFix is a lightweight macOS menu bar app that restores sharp display edges by overlaying customizable “caps” on the screen corners. Safe, SIP-friendly, and easy to use, it lets you toggle, resize, and recolor caps to reclaim the squared look Apple removed in macOS 26. Multi-monitor support included.

⭐ Stelle: 21

🍴 Forks: 2

💻 Linguaggio: Swift

📜 Licenza: MIT License

⏰ Creato il: 2025-09-21T19:04:02Z
